page.shortlink: api inet namespace uploaded file class index
page.description: Methods and properties for a file that has been uploaded to the server. Files can be uploaded using Action Javascript or a form POST submit action.

property.name: FileName
property.description: The filename of the uploaded file. Includes the filename and extension. *[xb:FileName]* does not include the file path.

property.name: Data
property.description: The data in the uploaded file. Data is loaded into system memory when requested.

property.name: Size
property.description: The size of the file. Check this value before accessing the *[xb:Data]* property to prevent issues caused by loading very large files into memory.

property.name: CallResult
property.description: A [CallResult] object that contains information about the result of the file upload to the server. If an error occurred during file upload, additional information can be found in this property.

ref.link: server a5w uploading files to the application server

see.ref: Uploading Files to the Application Server (using an HTML form)
